site_name: Wornington Green Estate - Land bounded by the main railway, Wornington Road, Munro Mews,Portobello Road and including land fronting Ladbroke Grove near the Barlby Road junction London W10
description: Details required by conditions 32 (combustion plant - partially discharged by Phase 1 CON/09/02786 - as amended by NMA/16/04642), 65 (Phase 1 communal network & temporary energy centre - partially discharged by CON/09/02786 - as amended by NMA/16/04642 & NMA/17/01887), 68 (street parking provision - partially discharged by Phase 1 CON/13/03705 - as amended by NMA/16/04642) and 69 (free car club membership - partially discharged by Phase 1 CON/13/03705 - as amended by NMA/16/04642) of planning permission PP/13/04516 (MAJOR REDEVELOPMENT SCHEME)
